processingCommand.script:
! Publish Vanilla
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#  = ${WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ${REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#}
:SET &VANILLA_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#   = ${RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#}
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#  = "${EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#}"

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_WMS_PRIMARY_URL#  = ${WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_PRIMARY_URL# = ${REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#}
:SET &VANILLA_RW_PRIMARY_URL#   = ${RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#}
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_PRIMARY_URL#  = "${EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#}"

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_RW_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_WMS_USERNAME#      = ${WMS_USERNAME#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_USERNAME#     = ${REFS_USERNAME#}
:SET &VANILLA_RW_USERNAME#       = ${RW_USERNAME#}
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_USERNAME#      = "${EMS_USERNAME#}"

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_RW_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_USERNAME#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_CODE_BACKUP_PATH# = ${APP_CODE_BACKUP_PATH#}
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_CODE_BACKUP_PATH#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_APP_RUN_MODE# = ${APP_RUN_MODE#}
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_APP_RUN_MODE#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_DB_DIRECTORY_NAME# = ${DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#}
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#    = ${WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#}
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_PORT#       = ${WMS_DB_PORT#}
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_SID#        = ${WMS_DB_SID#}
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_USERNAME#   = ${WMS_DB_USERNAME#}
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_PASSWORD#   = ${WMS_DB_PASSWORD#}
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_SCHEMA#     = ${WMS_DB_SCHEMA#}

:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#   = ${REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_PORT#      = ${REFS_DB_PORT#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_SID#       = ${REFS_DB_SID#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_USERNAME#  = ${REFS_DB_USERNAME#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_PASSWORD#  = ${REFS_DB_PASSWORD#}
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_SCHEMA#    = ${REFS_DB_SCHEMA#}

:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#    = "${EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#}"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_PORT#       = "${EMS_DB_PORT#}"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_SID#        = "${EMS_DB_SID#}"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_USERNAME#   = "${EMS_DB_USERNAME#}"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_PASSWORD#   = "${EMS_DB_PASSWORD#}"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_SCHEMA#     = "${EMS_DB_SCHEMA#}"

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_PORT#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_SID#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_PORT#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_SID#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_PASSWORD#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_SCHEMA#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_PORT#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_SID#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,TOP

! Backup modules
:SET &VANILLA_MODULES# = ""

:SET &VANILLA_FAILOVER#         = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_BACKUP#       = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_BACKUP#      = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_RW_BACKUP#        = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_BACKUP#       = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_WMS_FAIL_BACKUP#  = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_RW_FAIL_BACKUP#   = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_FAIL_BACKUP#  = "false"

:SET &VANILLA_WMS_DB_BACKUP#    = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_REFS_DB_BACKUP#   = "false"
:SET &VANILLA_EMS_DB_BACKUP#    = "false"

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &VANILLA_WMS_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &VANILLA_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&VANILLA_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &VANILLA_REFS_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &VANILLA_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&VANILLA_MODULES#, "REFS,")
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &VANILLA_RW_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &VANILLA_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&VANILLA_MODULES#, "RW,")
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &VANILLA_EMS_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &VANILLA_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&VANILLA_MODULES#, "EMS,")
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &VANILLA_FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
: SET &VANILLA_FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
: SET &VANILLA_FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
: SET &VANILLA_FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_RW_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_RW_FAIL_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_WMS_DB_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_REFS_DB_BACKUP#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_EMS_DB_BACKUP#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_FAILOVER#,,TOP

:SET &VANILLA_INSTANCE_STOP# = "N"
:PUBLISH &VANILLA_INSTANCE_STOP#,,TOP

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&VANILLA_MODULES#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &VANILLA_MODULES# = SUBSTR(&VANILLA_MODULES#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &VANILLA_MODULES#,,TOP
